column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Chris - Thank you for your review. We appreciate the constructive feedback. I understand fully your concern with our Crispy Chicken Wings. As a franchise concept
column2: we are required to carry certain menu items that are created by our corporate headquarters
column3: which is based in Los Angeles. And in the case of the wings
column4: we are required to serve these organic chicken wings from Jidori Chickens that are raised and shipped from California.
